Uses of Class
com.jaunt.HttpResponse

  • Packages that use HttpResponse 
    Package Description
    com.jaunt
    Jaunt 1.1 [website] is a web-scraping & automation library that provides a lightweight HTTP useragent (headless browser), including JSON parser.
    com.jaunt.util  

    • Uses of HttpResponse in com.jaunt

      Fields in com.jaunt declared as HttpResponse 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HttpResponse UserAgent.response
      The Response object generated by the most recent HTTP request.
      Methods in com.jaunt that return HttpResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpResponse ResponseException.getResponse()
      Returns the Response associated with the Exception, which encapsulated meta-data (including HTTP status codes) for the HTTP response.
      HttpResponse UserAgent.sendHEAD(String url)
      Sends an HTTP HEAD request to the specified url; UserAgent.response is created to represent the HttpResponse (the response headers and other response-related information), and is also the return value.
      HttpResponse UserAgent.sendHEAD(String url, String... additionalHeaders)
      Sends an HTTP HEAD request to the specified url; UserAgent.response is created to represent the HttpResponse (the response headers and other response-related information), and is also the return value.
      Constructors in com.jaunt with parameters of type HttpResponse 
      Constructor and Description
      ResponseException(String message, HttpResponse response, String requestUrlData)
      Create a ResponseException from the specified text (error message) and Response object, which can be null (indicating an ability to make a connection).

    • Uses of HttpResponse in com.jaunt.util

      Methods in com.jaunt.util that return HttpResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpResponse HandlerForText.getResponse()
      Returns the HttpResponse, which represents meta-information associated with the HTTP response.
      HttpResponse HandlerForBinary.getResponse()
      Returns the HttpResponse, which represents meta-information associated with the HTTP response.
      Methods in com.jaunt.util with parameters of type HttpResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void HandlerForText.handle(UserAgent ua, HttpResponse response, InputStream is, BufferedReader br)
      Satisfies interface.
      void HandlerForBinary.handle(UserAgent ua, HttpResponse response, InputStream is, BufferedReader br)
      satisfies interface.
      void Handler.handle(UserAgent ua, HttpResponse response, InputStream inputStream, BufferedReader br)
      Handle the response data by reading from either the InputStream or the BufferedReader
